Html:
Whenever I log in as an administrator and click on the "Downloads" button in in an Event I get the following error:

DataBinding: 'System.Char' does not allow indexed access.
Description: An unhandled exception occurred during the execution of the current web request. Please review the stack trace for more information about the error and where it originated in the code.

Exception Details: System.ArgumentException: DataBinding: 'System.Char' does not allow indexed access.

Source Error:


Line 22: <div id="body"><div class="fullwidth"><h2>Downloads for Event: <asp:Repeater id="Repeater1" runat="server" DataSourceID="SqlDataSource2">
Line 23: <ItemTemplate>
Line 24: <%#DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem, "Title")%>
Line 25: </ItemTemplate>
Line 26: </asp:Repeater>
